trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee is anxious about their dealings with the Nu Mou.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location north of Phisor Lran and slay a sweet echevore for its tail.
TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the echevore tail to Uin Nee.

TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_UINNEE_000_000<tab>Well, if it isn't my favorite mortal! And do you know <var 1A 02 /var>why<var 1A 01 /var> you're my favorite? Why, it's because you have a knack for showing up <var 1A 02 /var>precisely<var 1A 01 /var> when I need something done. Like now, for example!

TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_UINNEE_000_001<tab>You see, I've asked a Nu Mou crafter to craft me a delightful new toy to bring to the children in their dreams, and I promised I'd repay them with something very, very special─an echevore tail, to be precise!

TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Have you ever seen an echevore tail? You can smell them or sip from them, and they have the taste and aroma of sweet, sweet honey! A bit <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> sweet for my liking, to tell the truth, but the Nu Mou just can't seem to get enough of them.

TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_UINNEE_000_003<tab>But there's a bit of a rub. The sweetest of the sweet echevores can only be found distressingly close to the stamping grounds of those oh-so-nasty Fuath. Just imagining being gripped in those slimy, slippery, slobbery hands makes me─ick! Why did you make me think such unpleasant thoughts!?

TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_UINNEE_000_004<tab>Hmph! As penance, I demand that you go forth and fetch the echevore tail that I seek! And if you see any Fuath along the way, feel free to smack them in their smarmy faces with those stupid little hats of theirs!
TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_UINNEE_000_010<tab><sniff> Is that sweet, sweet honey I smell? I knew you wouldn't come back empty-handed! Well, hand it over then, already!

TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_UINNEE_000_011<tab>Why, I say, this is the sweetest aroma I've ever had the pleasure of smelling! Perhaps those Nu Mou <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> know what they're talking about. Perhaps they won't mind if I take just a teeny-tiny smidgen...

TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_UINNEE_000_012<tab>Ahem! Which is to say, of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> I'm not thinking of taking a sip! We pixies have <var 1A 02 /var>far<var 1A 01 /var> more refined palates than those silly Nu Mou. We're not ones to sit around all day sucking on these icky tails!
TEXT_BANPIX105_03693_UINNEE_000_013<tab>At any rate, thank you as always for being so subser─er, helpful! So helpful! Please come back again soon! Now, just a tiny little... Hmm? You're still here?
